original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>所有場合皆可使用</color>降低敵方 <color=#ccffcc>400</color> 點士氣，並且對敵方<color=#ccffcc>5</color>名武將隨機造成以下<color=#ccffcc>3</color>種異常狀態。<color=#FFE787>中毒：</color>每秒 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4945)@</color> 點體力，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4945)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>沉默：</color>無法使用招式，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4942)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>緩速：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4948)@</color> 點移動速度，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4948)@</color> 秒
text: <color=#FFE787>Usage restrictions: </color><color=#ccffcc>Can be used in all occasions</color>Reduce the enemy's morale <color=#ccffcc>400</color>, and against the enemy Fang <color=#ccffcc>5</color> famous generals randomly caused the following <color=#ccffcc>3</color> abnormal conditions. <color=#FFE787>Poisoning:  </color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4945)@</color> points physical strength per second, continuous <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4945)@</color> Seconds <color=#FFE787>Silence: </color> Unable to use moves, continue <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4942)@</color> Seconds <color=#FFE787>Slow down: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4948)@</color> Point movement speed, continuous <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4948)@</color> seconds
